title: app/adminPanel
description: Defines what to display on the Administration page.

label.description: A panel label. A translation path: Admin > labels > {label}.

order.description: Used for ordering panels on the page.

url.description: A link URL. You can use an URL like #Admin/{myName}, in this case you also need to define a recordView.

label.description: An item (link) label. A translation path: Admin > labels > {label}.

iconClass.description: A CSS class for the icon.

description.description: A translation key for a description text. A translation page: Admin > descriptions > {description}.

recordView.description: A record view. Optional. Needed if you defined the URL like #Admin/{myName}. The record view displays settings fields. https://docs.TPDCRM.com/development/custom-config-parameters/

tabQuickSearch.description: Makes available in the navbar tab quick search. As if v9.0.
